title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: This course covers the fundamentals of Python, from variables and data types to functions and basic data structures. No prior experience needed! It's designed to get you from zero to your first functional program.

whatYouWillLearn: Understand the basic syntax and concepts of Python.
Write your own Python scripts and functions.
Work with fundamental data structures: lists, tuples, and dictionaries.
Grasp the basics of object-oriented programming.

syllabus.title: Getting Started
syllabus.content: Installation, Hello World, Variables & Data Types.

syllabus.title: Functions
syllabus.content: Defining and calling functions, parameters, and return values.

syllabus.title: Data Structures
syllabus.content: In-depth look at Lists, Dictionaries, and Tuples.

syllabus.title: Final Project
syllabus.content: Building a small console-based application to apply all learned concepts.

requirements: A computer with Windows, macOS, or Linux.
No prior programming experience is required.
details.targetAudience: Absolute beginners in programming or students from other fields looking to pick up a new skill.

title: Acoustic Guitar for Beginners
description: Learn the basic chords, strumming patterns, and everything you need to play your first song on the guitar. This course focuses on practical skills and building a solid foundation.

whatYouWillLearn: How to properly hold and tune a guitar.
The most common open chords (G, C, D, Em, Am).
Essential strumming patterns for popular songs.
Play at least one full song by the end of the course.

syllabus.title: The Basics
syllabus.content: Anatomy of the guitar, tuning, and proper posture.

syllabus.title: First Chords
syllabus.content: Learning the G, C, and D major chords.

syllabus.title: Expanding Your Chord Vocabulary
syllabus.content: Adding Em, Am, and F major chords.

syllabus.title: Playing Your First Song
syllabus.content: Putting it all together to play a popular tune.

requirements: An acoustic guitar (nylon or steel string).
A guitar tuner (can be a mobile app).
details.targetAudience: Anyone who has never picked up a guitar before or who has struggled to learn on their own.
